name: Peter Hirt
introduction: Peter Hirt (born 30 March 1910 and died 28 June 1992) was a Swiss businessman who participated in some Formula One races between 1951 and 1953. He primarily raced with curie Espadon, a team for Swiss amateur gentleman racers lead by Rudi Fischer. He made his debut at the 1951 Swiss Grand Prix in a Veritas he entered himself, although he retired with a mechanical failure on the first lap.
